1001148.1000851.1000868.1000995.description=Tested and ready for the long haul, Genuine Toyota tow hitch receivers offer:
• Up to 16 connection points to the frame to distribute the towing force, while reducing stress and preserving the integrity of the Tundra
• No-drill hitch and wire harness installation maintains the structural integrity of the frame
• Extensive on- and off-road testing ensures real world functionality and durability
• Class III hitch: for color-keyed bumpers, 5,000-lb. towing capacity, uses a 4-pin harness
• Class IV hitch: for steel bumpers, 8,000-lb. towing capacity, uses a 7-pin harness

Before towing, confirm your vehicle and trailer are compatible, hooked up and loaded properly and that you have any necessary additional equipment. Do not exceed any Weight Ratings and follow all instructions in your Ownerâ€™s Manual. The maximum you can tow depends on the total weight of any cargo, occupants and available equipment. 1001148.1002622.1000868.1001018.source=NVS 1001148.1000851.1000868.1001018.package=true 1001148.1000851.1000868.1001010.source=NVS 1001148.1002622.1000868.1000999.title=Towing hitch receiver (4.6L V8 only) 1001148.1000851.1000868.1001018.description=Tow hitch (4.6L V8 only)
